title: K-12 MOOC Learner Self-Regulated Learning Management Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Targeting Students and Job Seekers in Their 20s, the Program Aims to Acquire Strategies for Enhancing Self-Regulated Learning in Mathematics MOOCs. Practical Educational Program Design Using Mixed Research Methods (Survey, Interview, Document Analysis)

learning_goals: Learners can set weekly learning objectives and monitor progress
Learners can establish study plans using time management tools (progress indicators, etc.)
Learners can flexibly explore and utilize learning resources in online environments
Learners sustainably maintain self-regulated learning through peer evaluation systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
